original_text: and its gates will never be shut by day—and there will be no night there.
korean_text: 낮에 성문들을 도무지 닫지 아니하리니 거기에는 밤이 없음이라

sentences.original_text: and its gates will never be shut
sentences.korean_translation: 그 문들은 결코 닫히지 않을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and there will be no night there
